snippet.title: CHIP-8 Emulator - Atari Lynx Homebrew
snippet.description:
CHIP-8 is an interpreted programming language, developed by Joseph Weisbecker.
CHIP-8 programs are run on a CHIP-8 virtual machine.
It was made to allow video games to be more easily programmed.

This is a first ever emulator for the Atari Lynx. There is an included selection of CHIP-8 games:
- Brix
- Pong
- Invaders
- Blinky
- Blitz
- Tetris
- UFO
- Joust
- Super Blinky
- Worm
- Car

Developed by CabaretVoltaire
Download page: https://atarigamer.com/lynx/game/CHIP8Emulator/373357128

RetroArch core: Beetle Lynx
